"I'm ready to come back to your troops MEgatron"replied 
Perceptor "What do you want that I do?"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gestalt_menasor@y... wrote:
> Megatron thinks to himself. "Yes, you will be perfect for welcoming 
> them. Take Wildrider and Astrotrain (since Icedeamon quit, we call 
> the name), in case you run into problems. Contact me when you reach 
> the site." Megatron kept his eyes focused on Blindfear. "You served 
> me well as a Decepticon before....therefore I will give you a 
chance 
> to earn our trust." He released his iron grip on the throat.
